page.title: 04MY FAVOURITE THINGS -BENTHAM
page.content: BOY-My favourite meal is sausages, chips and peas. After I like Arctic Roll or Trifle. I enjoy playing "Sorry" and "Test Match". I was given some "Look-In" comics, I think they're the best. My favourite sport is swimming. I take my Gold Survival this year. I enjoy football and rounders. The best television programmes are "Young Ones", "BMX Track Wars", "The A Team" and "Street Hawk". GIRL-My favourite dog is called Jack. Our car is silver, my favourite colour. My most favoured foods are tomato, ham, boiled eggs, tomato soup, lemonade and Coke. I enjoy scribbling on bits of paper and reading books. I am reading an exciting story called "Supermouse". I play Gran's piano and have an electric organ of my own.
